Blog.post: time to party! saw my country bumpkin yesterday... had a right royal good time.... partying away... etc in the middle of the melbourne CBD! yay
I love you I love your style pitty you live in the country I wanna eat your nose... then your toes But you live in the country isn't it borining there with out city life? :)

youve got a methodist coloring book and you color really well - but dont color outside the lines or god will send you to hell. cuz god hates war, and god hates crime, but he really hates people who color outside of the line poltically inncorrect i'm sure... but i honestly don't care ;) have a nice day!

sim i have a sticker that says "alien lover" on my jacket - From my Friend Tweets who i regularly talk to on IRC hmmm i don't know about that one tweets... last time i checked your girlfriend was quite human... unless ur not telling me something here? :P

David bowie once said in the song Lets Dance: "if you say run i'll run with you" I wanna dance... but not the dancing he had in mind... i want to dance with the moon howl at it to cringe and make people cry if need be... when the mood took me when it took them.. blah and so it goes and so it goes....
